It's ironic——
when I wrap my arms around her,
I'm the one that feels protected

Even
if the day we met
would have never taken place,
somehow,
someway,
in another day,
we would have met
and fallen in love
like the first day.

Her dress
was the least
of her outfit——
no one
wore a smile
like her.

The light of the moon
failed in comparison
to the light
of her soul.

If I were a poet,
I would write a book,
filled with poems and stories
of the love
you have made me feel.

If one could
capture the
brightness of all the stars
in the night sky
your smile would outshine it.

They say
"when a person falls in love
they feel as though 
they have discovered 
love for the first time"
Nobody has ever felt
the way I feel
about you.
